name: nebulix
title: Nebulix
desc: A Fast & Green Theme Based on Astro + Static CMS + Snipcart. with a Universe of Possibilities: Blogs, Portfolios, Restaurant Menus, Online Store, and Beyond.
article:
Optimized Speed and Accessibility

Nebulix doesn't just prioritize speed; it also adheres to the highest accessibility standards. Achieving a near-perfect 98% to 100% page speed score and full compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards, Nebulix ensures an exceptional user experience for everyone.

Tailwind CSS: Your Design, Your Vision

Elevate your website's aesthetics with the beloved Tailwind CSS framework. Nebulix makes it effortless to customize your design, allowing you to bring your unique vision to life. Tailor your site's appearance to match your brand and captivate your audience.

Lightning-Fast Full-Text Search

Enhance your website's user experience with the integrated Pagefind search engine. Visitors can enjoy lightning-fast full-text search capabilities, finding the information they need quickly and effortlessly.

Effortless Webshop Integration

Nebulix seamlessly integrates with SnapCart, offering you a straightforward webshop solution. Whether you're selling physical or digital products, Nebulix handles product variations with ease, ensuring a seamless shopping experience for your customers.

Versatile Templates for Every Purpose

Nebulix offers a variety of templates for pages, blogs, shops, portfolios, and menus. Tailor each page precisely as you envision, ensuring your website meets your unique needs and resonates with your audience.

Page Block Builder: Craft with Precision

Building the perfect page is a breeze with Nebulix's intuitive Page Block Builder. Choose from a selection of versatile blocks to customize and extend your page exactly the way you envision it. No coding expertise required.

Restaurant Menu: User-Friendly and Informative

For restaurant owners, Nebulix includes a user-friendly menu feature. Thoughtfully designed with clear labels and detailed allergen information, it guarantees peace of mind for diners.
